name: mlNikon's Pebble Donut
description:
Pebbles donut for this weeks show. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LXCfQsQDFYg&feature=youtu.be

If you like what we do and want to support us in a fun, tasty way check out our one shots!
https://flavorjungle.com/pages/search-results-page?q=mixing+vixens
author: mixinvixens

reviews.text: This is delicious, I get more of a fruit loop vibe from this, but I think it may be better that way. That donut is really good too, i love what that flv sweet dough is doing. Awesome mix!
